## Introduction

This is a simple introduction to **gamInflu**.

### Basic Usage

```{r eval=FALSE}
# Basic workflow
library(gamInflu)
library(mgcv)

# 1. Prepare data (focus must be factor)
data$year <- factor(data$year)

# 2. Fit model
model <- gam(response ~ s(x) + year, data = data)

# 3. Influence analysis
gi <- gam_influence(model, focus = "year")
gi <- calculate_influence(gi)

# 4. Results
indices <- extract_indices(gi)
plot_standardisation(gi)
```

## Features

- Multi-family support (Gaussian, binomial, gamma, Poisson, Tweedie)
- Automatic family detection
- Comprehensive plotting functions
- Standardised output format
- Model validation tools
